column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " Pretty clouds . "
#Text=Zuko says : " Yeah ... fluffy .
#Text=Oh , I did n't say anything .
#Text=You know , a friend of mine actually designed these war balloons .
#Text=" Zuko says : " No kidding .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yep , a balloon ... but for war .
#Text=" Zuko says : " If there 's one thing my dad 's good at , it 's war .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , it seems to run in the family .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Hey , hold on .
#Text=Not everyone in my family is like that .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I know , I know , you 've changed .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I meant my uncle .
#Text=He was more of a father to me .
#Text=And I really let him down .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I think your uncle would be proud of you .
#Text=Leaving your home to come help us ?
#Text=That 's hard .
#Text=" Zuko says : " It was n't that hard .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Really ?
#Text=You did n't leave behind anyone you cared about ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Well , I did have a girlfriend .
#Text=Mai .
#Text=" Sokka says : " That gloomy girl who sighs a lot ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Yeah .
#Text=Everyone in the Fire Nation thinks I 'm a traitor .
#Text=I could n't drag her into it .
#Text=" Sokka says : " My first girlfriend turned into the moon .
#Text=" Zuko says : " That 's rough , buddy .
#Text=" Zuko says : " There it is !
#Text=There 's plenty of steam to keep us covered .
#Text=As long as we 're quiet , we should be able to navigate through it without being caught .
#Text=" Zuko says : " We 're going down !
#Text=The balloon 's not working anymore !
#Text=" Sokka says : " The air outside is just as hot as the air inside so we ca n't fly !
#Text=" Zuko says : " So what are we supposed to do ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I do n't know !
#Text=Crash - landing ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " How are we gon na get off the island if the balloon wo n't work ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " We 'll figure something out !
#Text=I suspected it might be a one - way ticket .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You knew this would happen and you wanted to come anyway ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " My dad might be here !
#Text=I had to come and see !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Uncle always said I never thought things through .
#Text=But this ... this is just crazy !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , I never wanted you to come along in the first place !
#Text=And for the record , I always think things through !
#Text=But my plans have n't exactly worked , so this time , I 'm playing it by ear .
#Text=So there .
#Text=" Zuko says : " What are you doing ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " It does n't work anyway , and we do n't want anyone to find it .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I hope you know what you 're doing .
#Text=There 's no turning back now .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I hope these disguises work .
#Text=" Sokka says : " We just need to lay low and find my dad as soon as possible .
#Text=" Male guard says : " Guards !
#Text=There 's a scuffle in the yard .
#Text=Come on .
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " I did n't do anything !
#Text=I 'm going back to my cell .
#Text=" Bully guard says : " Stop right there , Chit Sang .
#Text=" Sokka says : " We ca n't blow our cover .
#Text=" Bully guard says : " I 've had it with your unruly behavior !
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " What did I do ?
#Text=" Bully guard says : " He wants to know what he did .
#Text=Is n't that cute ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Uh , very cute , sir .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Super cute .
#Text=" Bully guard says : " You did n't bow down when I walked by , Chit Sang !
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " What ?
#Text=That 's not a prison rule .
#Text=" Bully guard says : " Do it !
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " Make me .
#Text=" Bully guard says : " Tsk , tsk .
#Text=Firebending is prohibited .
#Text=You 're going in the cooler .
#Text=You !
#Text=Help me take him in .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Meet back here in an hour .
#Text=" Bully guard says : " The warden will deal with you soon .
#Text=Can you believe this guy ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Prisoners !
#Text=Am I right ?
#Text=" Bully guard says : " Ugh .
#Text=Tell me about it .
#Text=" Male guard says : " Hey , new guy !
#Text=I know it 's the rule to have your helmet on at all times , but this is the lounge .
#Text=Relax .
#Text=" Zuko says : " But what if there 's an incident ?
#Text=If I 'm not prepared , someone could strike me on the head .
#Text=" Female guard says : " Give it a week , he 'll loosen up .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Can the new guy ask you veterans a few questions about the prison ?
#Text=" Female guard says : " No , you ca n't date the female guards .
#Text=" Male guard says : " Trust me , you do n't want to .
#Text=" Zuko says : " No , that 's not it .
#Text=The Boiling Rock , it holds the Fire Nation 's most dangerous criminals , right ?
#Text=So what about war prisoners ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " It sure looks cold in there .
#Text=" Bully guard says : " That 's why we call it the cooler .
#Text=He wo n't be firebending there .
#Text=It 's the warden !
#Text=Look alive !
#Text=" Warden says : " So Chit Sang , I hear you used firebending to try to escape .
#Text=You should know better .
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " I was n't trying to escape .
#Text=" Bully guard says : " He 's lying !
#Text=I saw it with my own eyes .
#Text=" Warden says : " No one has ever , ever escaped from here .
#Text=I 'd sooner jump in the Boiling Lake myself than let that record fall .
#Text=Do n't forget it .
#Text=Now go back to your shivering .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Hey there , fellow guard , how goes it ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Zuko ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Shhh !
#Text=Listen , I asked around the lounge .
#Text=There are no Water Tribe prisoners .
#Text=I 'm afraid your father 's not here .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What ?
#Text=Are you sure , did you double - check ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Yeah , I 'm sure .
#Text=" Sokka says : " No .
#Text=No !
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'm really sorry , Sokka .
#Text=" Sokka says : " So we came all this way for nothing ?
#Text=I failed ... again .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Ah , what would Uncle say ?
#Text=Sometimes , clouds have two sides , a dark and light , and a silver lining in between .
#Text=It 's like a silver sandwich !
#Text=So ... when life seems hard ... take a bite out of the silver sandwich !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Maybe we have n't failed after all !
#Text=" Zuko says : " That 's the spirit !
#Text=I ca n't believe that worked .
#Text=I did n't even know what I was saying .
#Text=" Sokka says : " No , what you said made no sense at all .
#Text=But look ... It 's Suki !
#Text=" Guard says : " Prisoners , back in your cells !
#Text="
